title: Decision Item
description: An item which can be subjected to decisioning. The output of a decisioning process is one or more decision items.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Item Tags
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: An array of Unified TagIds associated with the decision item.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Item Constraints
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Constraints define the policies that ensure a particular decision Item qualifies, is relevant and is suitable for a particular profile. Such policy rules determine the eligibility, applicability and suitability of the option. Usually the option is tested against a user profile and the events that were observed for that profile, but the qualification rule can consider any context data as long as it can be described by an XDM schema.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Item Priority
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Priority of a decision item, based on which decision items could be ranked

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Item CatalogId
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Each decision item belong to a catalog. CatalogId is used to relate to the catalog. Collections are derived based on select queries and catalogId helps to avoid joins with DecisionCatalog table during query execution in hub and especially the edges.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Item Calendar Constraints
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Defines the date range during which this decision item is eligible. This constraint may not be strictly enforced always.
